reviews.comment: A nice challenge

reviews.title: Thank you SOOO MUCH for the update...
reviews.comment: Now I can play! And it\'s a great game, very fun. Great graphics and PERFECT feedback! (Two days after I complained that the game wasn\'t working on my droid 3 they fixed it!!! That\'s excellent feedback!) Keep up the good work guys =)

reviews.title: Awesome game

reviews.title: Addictive!!!
reviews.comment: It\'s awesome game. And I love the concept of it which is saving Earth and caring about the environment. Graphics are very nice. Touch is very responsive and smooth. Keep it up.
